info.description: Manage chats, users, tournaments. For JWT authentication use 'Bearer <token>' format in Authorization header.
info.title: GoPadel server

post.description: Create a new admin user. Available only for superuser.
Change password for currently authenticated admin
Authenticate admin user and return JWT token

get.description: Get information about currently authenticated admin
Get all clubs. Available for any admin.

post.description: Create a new club. Available for superusers only.

delete.description: Delete club. Available for superusers only.

patch.description: Update club data. Available for superusers only.

get.description: Get all courts. Available for any admin.

post.description: Create a new court. Available only for superuser.

get.description: Get court by ID. Available for any admin.

delete.description: Delete court. Available only for superuser.

patch.description: Update court data. Available only for superuser.

post.description: Create a new event. Available for any admin.
Get filtered list of events with extended admin filters. Available for any admin.

get.description: Get waitlist for specific event. Available for any admin.

delete.description: Delete an existing event. Available for any admin.

patch.description: Update an existing event. Available for any admin.

post.description: Get filtered list of admin users. Available only for superuser.

get.description: Get all loyalty levels. Available for any admin.

post.description: Create a new loyalty level. Available for any admin.

delete.description: Delete loyalty level. Available for any admin.

patch.description: Update loyalty level data. Available for any admin.

post.description: Get filtered list of users. Available for any admin.

patch.description: Update user data. Available only for superuser. Cannot change telegramUsername.

delete.description: Delete admin user. Available only for superuser.

patch.description: Update admin user data. Available only for superuser.

post.description: Handles payment status updates from YooKassa

get.description: Returns a list of all courts. Only available for authenticated Telegram admins.

delete.description: Deletes an event with access rights verification

post.summary: Add current user to event waitlist

delete.summary: Remove current user from event waitlist

200.description: A url to the stored image
List of user's registrations with event details

post.description: Creates a new registration for an event with PENDING status

403.description: Forbidden - user already registered or validation failed

post.description: Cancels a registration with PENDING status (before payment)

403.description: Forbidden - no pending registration or cannot cancel
Forbidden - no confirmed registration or cannot cancel

post.description: Creates a payment for event registration and returns payment URL
Reactivates a cancelled registration if event has available slots

403.description: Forbidden - no cancelled registration or cannot reactivate
